name: Rocket Artist
description:
You thought drawing was tough already? Try doing it with a horribly inconvenient control scheme!

Features:
- 15 Unique levels
- Beautiful MS-Paint tier assets
- Poorly coded scoring systems

Controls:
- Turn your ship with the arrow keys
- Press Z to fire your thrusters
- Press X to pull on your space-brakes
- Press C to lay down paint
- Press E to submit your masterpiece

Standalone downloads are provided for windows.  For those running other platforms, the source code is available, which can be run with the love2d runtimes here: https://love2d.org/.  This game was made for love 11.1.

Space Background by LuminousDragonGames - https://opengameart.org/users/luminousdragongames
Music by soleil-musique - http://soleilmusique.web.fc2.com/
